text: I yesli dva otryada veruyushchikh budut srazhat'sya drug s drugom, to primirite, o veruyushchiye, ikh! Yesli zhe odin iz otryadov napal na drugoy i otkazalsya primirit'sya, to srazhaytes' s tem, kotoryy otkazalsya pomirit'sya, poka on ne priznayet veleniya Allakha, rukovodstvuyas' Yego shariatom. A yesli on priznayet resheniye Allakha, primirite ikh po sovesti i bud'te spravedlivymi ko vsem lyudyam vo vsekh delakh. Poistine, Allakh lyubit spravedlivykh i bespristrastnykh
